Name: Second aggro
Description: Second aggro target from top of threatlist

Name: Random target except top
Description: Random target in threatlist except first aggro

Name: Action invoker
Description: Unit who caused this Event to occur

Name: Action invoker owner
Description: Onwer of unit who caused this Event to occur

Name: Random player not top
Description: Random player in threat list except top threat

Name: Event sender
Description: Unit who sent an AIEvent that was received with EVENT_T_RECEIVE_AI_EVENT

Name: Event specific
Description: Filled by corresponding event that triggered the action

Name: Player invoker
Description: Player who initiated hostile contact with this npc

Name: Player tapper
Description: Player who currently holds to score the kill credit from the npc

Name: None
Description: Default - passes no target - useful for spells

Name: Random with mana
Description: Random target in threatlist with mana

Name: Nearest AOE target
Description: Nearest target for AOE - used to check whether anyone is in range for aoe

Name: Farthest away
Description: Farthest target in threatlist from AI creature
